members.comment: Constructs a new instance of NoPermissionException using an explanation. All other fields default to null.

param: explanation - Possibly null additional detail about this exception.

members.comment: Constructs a new instance of NoPermissionException. All fields are initialized to null.

name: javax.naming.NoPermissionException
comment:
This exception is thrown when attempting to perform an operation for which the client has no permission. The access control/permission model is dictated by the directory/naming server.

Synchronization and serialization issues that apply to NamingException apply directly here.
